---
title: "{{title}}"
subtitle: "{{subtitle}}"
author: "{{author}}"
date: "{{date}}"
format:
  pdf:
    documentclass: article
    papersize: a4
    fontsize: 16pt
    geometry:
      - top=48pt
      - bottom=48pt
      - left=48pt
      - right=48pt
    include-in-header:
      text: |
        \usepackage{fontspec}
        \usepackage{xcolor}
        \usepackage{fancyhdr}
        \usepackage{graphicx}
        \usepackage{tcolorbox}
        \usepackage{listings}
        \usepackage{sectsty}
        \usepackage{titling}
        \usepackage{parskip}
        \usepackage{enumitem}

        % ============================================
        % IBM PLEX FONT FAMILY
        % ============================================

        % Use IBM Plex fonts with fallbacks
        \IfFontExistsTF{IBM Plex Sans}{
          \setmainfont{IBM Plex Sans}[
            UprightFont = *-Regular,
            BoldFont = *-SemiBold,
            ItalicFont = *-Italic,
            BoldItalicFont = *-SemiBoldItalic
          ]
        }{
          \setmainfont{Liberation Sans}
        }

        \IfFontExistsTF{IBM Plex Mono}{
          \setmonofont{IBM Plex Mono}[
            UprightFont = *-Regular,
            BoldFont = *-SemiBold
          ]
        }{
          \setmonofont{Liberation Mono}
        }

        % ============================================
        % CARBON COLOR TOKENS
        % ============================================

        % Primary Colors
        \definecolor{carbonBlue60}{HTML}{0f62fe}
        \definecolor{carbonGray10}{HTML}{f4f4f4}
        \definecolor{carbonGray20}{HTML}{e0e0e0}
        \definecolor{carbonGray50}{HTML}{8d8d8d}
        \definecolor{carbonGray70}{HTML}{525252}
        \definecolor{carbonGray80}{HTML}{393939}
        \definecolor{carbonGray90}{HTML}{262626}
        \definecolor{carbonGray100}{HTML}{161616}

        % Extended Colors
        \definecolor{carbonRed60}{HTML}{da1e28}
        \definecolor{carbonGreen50}{HTML}{24a148}
        \definecolor{carbonPurple60}{HTML}{8a3ffc}
        \definecolor{carbonCyan50}{HTML}{1192e8}
        \definecolor{carbonMagenta60}{HTML}{d02670}
        \definecolor{carbonTeal60}{HTML}{007d79}

        % ============================================
        % CARBON TYPOGRAPHY SCALE
        % ============================================

        % Base text: Body Long 02 (16pt, regular, 1.5 line height)
        \setlength{\parindent}{0pt}
        \setlength{\parskip}{0.5em}
        \linespread{1.5}

        % Heading 1 → Heading 06 (42pt, light weight, 1.19 line height)
        \sectionfont{%
          \color{carbonGray100}%
          \fontsize{42}{50}\selectfont%
          \fontseries{l}\selectfont%
        }

        % Heading 2 → Heading 05 (32pt, regular weight, 1.25 line height)
        \subsectionfont{%
          \color{carbonGray100}%
          \fontsize{32}{40}\selectfont%
          \fontseries{m}\selectfont%
        }

        % Heading 3 → Heading 04 (28pt, regular weight, 1.29 line height)
        \subsubsectionfont{%
          \color{carbonGray100}%
          \fontsize{28}{36}\selectfont%
          \fontseries{m}\selectfont%
        }

        % Heading 4 → Heading 03 (20pt, regular weight, 1.4 line height)
        \paragraphfont{%
          \color{carbonGray90}%
          \fontsize{20}{28}\selectfont%
          \fontseries{m}\selectfont%
        }

        % Heading 5 → Heading 02 (16pt, semibold weight, 1.375 line height)
        \subparagraphfont{%
          \color{carbonGray90}%
          \fontsize{16}{22}\selectfont%
          \fontseries{sb}\selectfont%
        }

        % ============================================
        % HEADER AND FOOTER
        % ============================================

        \pagestyle{fancy}
        \fancyhf{}

        % Header (Label 01: 12pt)
        \fancyhead[L]{%
          \color{carbonGray70}%
          \fontsize{12}{16}\selectfont%
          \textit{ {{title}} }%
        }

        % Footer (Label 01: 12pt)
        \fancyfoot[L]{%
          \color{carbonGray70}%
          \fontsize{12}{16}\selectfont%
          {{author}}%
        }
        \fancyfoot[C]{%
          \color{carbonGray70}%
          \fontsize{12}{16}\selectfont%
          \thepage%
        }
        \fancyfoot[R]{%
          \color{carbonGray70}%
          \fontsize{12}{16}\selectfont%
          {{date}}%
        }

        % Header/Footer rules
        \renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0.5pt}
        \renewcommand{\footrulewidth}{0.5pt}
        \renewcommand{\headrule}{%
          \hbox to\headwidth{%
            \color{carbonGray20}\leaders\hrule height \headrulewidth\hfill%
          }%
        }
        \renewcommand{\footrule}{%
          \hbox to\headwidth{%
            \color{carbonGray20}\leaders\hrule height \footrulewidth\hfill%
          }%
        }

        % ============================================
        % CODE BLOCKS (Code 02: 14pt)
        % ============================================

        \lstset{
          basicstyle=\fontsize{14}{20}\ttfamily\color{carbonGray100},
          backgroundcolor=\color{carbonGray10},
          frame=single,
          rulecolor=\color{carbonGray20},
          framesep=16pt,
          breaklines=true,
          commentstyle=\color{carbonGray70},
          keywordstyle=\color{carbonPurple60}\bfseries,
          stringstyle=\color{carbonGreen50},
          numberstyle=\tiny\color{carbonGray50},
          numbers=left,
          numbersep=12pt,
          tabsize=2,
          xleftmargin=16pt,
          xrightmargin=16pt
        }

        % Inline code (Code 01: 12pt, blue color)
        \let\oldtexttt\texttt
        \renewcommand{\texttt}[1]{%
          \colorbox{carbonGray10}{%
            \color{carbonBlue60}%
            \fontsize{12}{16}\ttfamily#1%
          }%
        }

        % ============================================
        % BLOCKQUOTES
        % ============================================

        \renewenvironment{quote}{%
          \begin{tcolorbox}[
            colback=carbonGray10,
            colframe=carbonBlue60,
            leftrule=4pt,
            rightrule=0pt,
            toprule=0pt,
            bottomrule=0pt,
            arc=4pt,
            boxsep=16pt,
            left=16pt,
            right=16pt,
            top=12pt,
            bottom=12pt
          ]%
          \itshape\color{carbonGray70}%
        }{%
          \end{tcolorbox}%
        }

        % ============================================
        % LISTS
        % ============================================

        \setlist[itemize]{%
          label=\textcolor{carbonBlue60}{\textbullet},%
          leftmargin=1em,%
          itemsep=0.5em%
        }

        \setlist[enumerate]{%
          label=\textcolor{carbonBlue60}{\arabic*.},%
          leftmargin=1em,%
          itemsep=0.5em%
        }

        % ============================================
        % TABLES
        % ============================================

        \usepackage{booktabs}
        \usepackage{array}

        % ============================================
        % HYPERLINKS
        % ============================================

        \usepackage{hyperref}
        \hypersetup{
          colorlinks=true,
          linkcolor=carbonBlue60,
          urlcolor=carbonBlue60,
          citecolor=carbonBlue60,
          pdfborder={0 0 0}
        }

        % ============================================
        % TITLE PAGE
        % ============================================

        \pretitle{%
          \begin{center}%
          \color{carbonBlue60}\rule{\textwidth}{4pt}\par
          \vspace{32pt}%
          \color{carbonGray100}\fontsize{42}{50}\selectfont\fontseries{l}\selectfont
        }
        \posttitle{%
          \par\vspace{16pt}%
          \end{center}%
        }

        \preauthor{%
          \begin{center}%
          \color{carbonGray100}\fontsize{16}{24}\selectfont\bfseries
        }
        \postauthor{%
          \par\vspace{8pt}%
          \end{center}%
        }

        \predate{%
          \begin{center}%
          \color{carbonGray70}\fontsize{14}{16}\selectfont
        }
        \postdate{%
          \par\vspace{48pt}%
          \begin{tcolorbox}[
            colback=carbonGray10,
            colframe=carbonGray20,
            arc=4pt,
            boxsep=12pt
          ]
          \centering\color{carbonGray70}\fontsize{12}{16}\selectfont
          \textit{Styled with IBM Carbon Design System (Advanced Template)}
          \end{tcolorbox}
          \end{center}%
          \vfill
        }
